title: Module Parameters: metadata_protocol_validator
description: Validates that the protocol associated with the session/subject matches expectations (by name and/or protocol id). May prompt the operator on mismatch.

metadata_protocol_prompt.description: Prompt shown to the operator if protocol validation needs confirmation (e.g. mismatch).

protocol_name.description: Observed protocol name from metadata (for advanced/legacy configurations).

protocol_id.description: Expected protocol identifier(s). Some metadata systems use numeric ids; others use strings.
